医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
特定健康检查参与率越高，肾病患病率越低日本的一项新生态研究显示，都道府县特定健康检查的参与率（SHC 参与率）对都道府县特有的 ESKD 治疗标准发病率 (SIR) 和都道府县慢性肾病 (CKD) 患病率有显着的负面影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Higher-participation-in-Specific-Health-Checkups-linked-with-lower-prevalence-of-kidney-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Higher-participation-in-Specific-Health-Checkups- Associated-with-lower-prevalence-of-kidney-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3aefc18-b76a-4f21-a564-d2c32effdaa1 Wed, 18 Oct 2023 23:32:04 -0400 Higher participation in Specific Health Checkups associated with lower prevalence of kidney disease
研究发现男性焦虑或抑郁与体外受精结果之间没有联系体外受精 (IVF) 是一种耗时且常常会产生压力的生育过程。然而这种压力如何影响其成功呢？麻省总医院布莱根医疗保健系统的创始成员布莱根妇女医院的研究人员评估了男性焦虑和抑郁对生育和试管受精结果的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Study-finds-no-link- Between-anxiety-or-depression-and-IVF-outcomes-in-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Study-finds-no-link- Between-anxiety-or-depression-and-IVF-outcomes-in-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73b12044-0808-440a-8b38-d0f5e34125f9 Wed, 18 Oct 2023 23:27:33 -0400 Study finds no link between anxiety or depression and IVF outcomes in men
研究比较了两种广泛使用的他汀类药物治疗冠状动脉疾病的方法瑞舒伐他汀和阿托伐他汀是两种广泛使用的他汀类药物，对于预防冠状动脉疾病患者的心脏病、中风和死亡同样有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Study-compares-two-widely-used-statins-for-treating-病人-with-coronary-artery-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Study-compares-two-widely-used-statins-for-treating-病人-with-coronary-artery-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7684e60f-4158-4d6d-bf50-3185e00bf924 Wed, 18 Oct 2023 23:22:14 -0400 Study compares two widely used statins for treating patients with coronary artery disease
动脉DNA损伤导致血管老化一篇新的研究论文发表在 Aging（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”和 Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 15 卷第 19 期，题为“Reduction of double-strand DNA Break Repair”加剧血管老化。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Arterial-DNA-damage-contributes-to-angio-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Arterial-DNA-damage-contributes-to-angio-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63b9f0c3-9215-48d3-8f0f-154d65d8a4c4 Wed, 18 Oct 2023 22:43:47 -0400 Arterial DNA damage contributes to vascular aging
休斯顿大学诊所扩建，为无家可归的患者提供眼部护理在休斯顿市中心的休斯顿大学护士管理诊所内的任何周一或周四，您都可以一睹为什么护理被称为“护理职业”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/University-of-Houston-clinic-expands-to-offer-eye-care-to-homeless-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/University-of-Houston-clinic-expands-to-offer-eye-care-to-homeless-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e864e00c-3f9c-4395-84ed-6f2c4bf93155 Wed, 18 Oct 2023 22:38:32 -0400 University of Houston clinic expands to offer eye care to homeless patients
将大脑免疫细胞转化为神经元可恢复小鼠中风样损伤后的大脑功能九州大学的研究人员发现，将大脑免疫细胞转化为神经元可以成功恢复小鼠中风样损伤后的大脑功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Turning-brain-immune-cells-into-neurons-restores-brain-function-after-中风-like-injury-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Turning-brain-immune-cells-into-neurons-restores-brain-function-after-中风-like-injury-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5543171-a1a4-46e8-98de-e04c86a86405 Wed, 18 Oct 2023 22:35:29 -0400 Turning brain immune cells into neurons restores brain function after stroke-like injury in mice
NIAID 的两项赠款将支持气候变化对艾滋病毒相关健康结果影响的研究美国国家过敏和传染病研究所 (NIAID) 提供的两项赠款（一项为期四年的 320 万美元奖金和一项为期 12 个月的 55 万美元行政补助）将支持创新研究，以加深对气候变化和极端天气如何影响艾滋病毒相关疾病的了解世界各地的健康成果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Two-NIAID-grants-will-support-research-on-impacts-of-climate-change-on-HIV-lated-health-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Two-NIAID-grants-will-support-research-on-impacts-of-climate-change-on-HIV-lated-health-outcomes.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=295e2b9e-fed8-4f72-90ba-42b8c6b79b52 Wed, 18 Oct 2023 22:29:08 -0400 Two NIAID grants will support research on impacts of climate change on HIV-related health outcomes
新模型有助于更好地了解阿尔茨海默病在大脑中的进展情况范安德尔研究所、隆德大学和佛罗伦萨大学的科学家开发的新模型将使研究人员能够更好地了解阿尔茨海默病在大脑中的进展情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/New-model-helps-to-better-understand-how-Alzheimers-disease-progresses-in-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/New-model-helps-to-better-understand-how-Alzheimers-disease-progresses-in-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26862076-ec38-419d-8a53-4dc740ac9a00 Wed, 18 Oct 2023 22:23:47 -0400 New model helps to better understand how Alzheimer's disease progresses in the brain
UTHealth 休斯顿研究调查大流行期间的驱逐保护如何影响心理健康在新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 大流行期间，暂停驱逐令阻止或推迟了许多人无家可归的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/UTHealth-Houston-study-to-examine-how-eviction-protection-during-the-pandemic-affects-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/UTHealth-Houston-study-to-examine-how-eviction-protection-during-the-pandemic-affects-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d1558d1-450b-4a7c-95d5-7fabcb84b27c Wed, 18 Oct 2023 22:17:09 -0400 UTHealth Houston study to examine how eviction protection during the pandemic affects mental health
COVID-19 感染与患吉兰-巴利综合征的风险增加相关根据 2023 年 10 月 18 日在线期刊《Neurology》（美国医学杂志《Neurology》）上发表的一项研究，感染 COVID-19 会增加在未来六周内患上称为吉兰-巴利综合征的罕见疾病的风险。美国神经病学学会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/COVID-19-infection-linked-with-increased-risk-of-developmenting-Guillain-Barre-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/COVID-19-infection-linked-with-increased-risk-of-developmenting-Guillain-Barre-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0a98c42-c037-417a-a644-555f9cf47ced Wed, 18 Oct 2023 22:10:54 -0400 COVID-19 infection associated with increased risk of developing Guillain-Barré syndrome
